p: Barbara et al. reported desirable nutritional properties for bee pollen extracts collected from stingless bees [ 130]. These extracts were reported to contain polyphenols, flavonoids and fatty acids, suggesting the antioxidant potential of stingless bee pollen [ 126, 130]. These findings have been supported by a recent study on eight stingless bee pollen samples from different regions in the Philippines [ 127]. The most common phenolic compounds in stingless bee pollen are summarized in Figure 11.
